main.bio: My name is Jubril, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, Look forward to working with you.

resume.skillmessage: A Full stack Jvascript developer, i love creating webapps using the Mern Stack (Mongodb, Express, Reactjs, Nodejs), have good experience with working with serverless architecture using Firebase a very amazing tool built by google i've built plenty popular website clones using this stacks

testimonials.text: Always willing to work and improve himself, a wonderful team player.

That Jubril Jammal must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
